hero.heroImageAlt: Picture of a yoga mat being rolled out.
hero.heading: Yoga and meditation for women
hero.subHeading: We help you stay vigorous in mind & body during menopause

reviews.name: Close-up picture of a happy client.
reviews.text: I enjoy every moment at yoga balance so much. It makes me feel younger and more living. I highly recomment this for every woman in menopause!

reviews.name: Picture of a happy client, drinking form a cup.
reviews.text: I can not live without my yoga classes at YogaBalance, it helps me find peace in mind and body.

courses.heading: Courses coming up
courses.subHeading: Our courses are designed for improved health during and after menopause

coursesArray.imgageAlt: Woman sitting on a mat in a yoga position.
coursesArray.text: Using yoga and meditation on a daily basis to improve your body and mind. Prepare to meet new experiences with renewed strenght, with soft movements.
coursesArray.shortDescription: 8 weeks Sensing Yoga and meditation practice, includes videos and live classes.

coursesArray.imgageAlt: Silhouette of woman in a meditaion position.
coursesArray.text: Meditation can help you reduce stress, sleep better and really get the recovery you need. It also helps you listen to your emotions and body to know when it’s time to slow down.
coursesArray.shortDescription: 10 weeks meditation practice, includes videos and live classes.

coursesArray.imgageAlt: Above perspective, picture of woman with locked hands.
coursesArray.text: Yin yoga course. Learn to relax and stretch your body with slow movement and static positions. Stress reducing and it helps you strengthen your mental health.
coursesArray.shortDescription: 8 weeks Yin Yoga, includes videos and live classes.

membership.heading: Our memberships
membership.subHeading: Get the most out of your yoga practice

offers.heading: All inclusive
offers.description: Go to all of our classes and courses and also participate in our retreats. You get personal help to from our instructors to plan your classes based on your goals. This is for you who will fully commit to living your full potential during menopause and beyond.

offers.heading: Yoga member
offers.description: Participate in all classes. This membership also includes one hour consultation with an instructor each month.

welcome.welcomeImageAlt: Picture of woman opening up a window, outside there's beatiful nature
welcome.heading: Enter our world of yoga for women
welcome.subHeading: Welcome to our world. We are a small Yoga center in Stockholm who helps women in menopause living a vivid and healthy life.

founder.heading: Our founder
founder.text: As a woman in her 50's I know everything about being in meno pause. My vision is to help other women feel good through life. Yoga helped me a lot to keep stress down, reduce anxiety, sleep better and get well deserved recovery.

labels.name: Name
labels.terms: I agree to terms and conditions
